title: Duck Life 4

headings.text: What are the worlds in Duck Life 4?

content.howToPlay: Start with creating ducks for your team.Train them how to run.Collect coins in training and buy food for your ducks with your coins to increase their energy levels.As you're ready for the tournament race, arrange your team and win the race to unlock another world where you'll learn new abilities.There are 6 worlds. Each has 3 different pieces of training to elevate the ducks' abilities, such as accuracy, speed, endurance, risk-taking and many more.Teach them how to run, climb, jump and fly and win the ultimate race.

fullContent: Homeâ€º AnimalDuck Life 4By OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenReady for a pentathlon experience as a duck? Race tracks in Duck Life 4 require speed and skill in five different categories: run, swim, climb, fly and jump. Train your ducks so well that they are ready for the Olympics!ControlsRunning Training ControlsPart 1 (Speed)Left and Right Arrows: MoveObjective: Go as deep as you can.Part 2 (Endurance)Left and Right Arrows: MoveObjective: Avoid getting hit by falling objects.Part 3 (Reactions)1 - 2 - 3 - 4 Number Keys: Control the duckObjective: Dodge the obstacles by jumping or sliding.Swimming Training ControlsPart 1 (Reactions)Up Arrow: JumpDown Arrow: DiveObjective: Jump over crocodiles and dive under trees. Dodge the obstacles.Part 2 (Endurance)Tap and Hold: Swim upwardsRelease Hold: swim downwardsObjective: Do not hit the cave walls and swim as long as you can.Part 3 (Timing)Tap and hold: Rotate the duckObjective: Make a perfect dive.Flying Training ControlsPart 1 (Endurance)Touch left and right side of screen: MoveObjective: Eat seeds and fly higherPart 2 (Reactions)Up and down arrow keys: Move the duckObjective: Avoid hitting any obstacles.Part 3 (Accuracy)Move mouse: AimLeft-click: Shoot the cannonObjective: Land in the middle of the targetClimbing Training ControlsPart 1 (Speed)Left and right arrows: Move the duckUp arrow: Climb laddersObjective: Climb to stay on the screen!Part 2 (Risk)Up and down arrow keys: ClimbRight arrow: Enter a caveLeft arrow: Exit a caveObjective: Hide from avalanches and get as high up as you can within 60 seconds.Part 3 (Reactions)Right and left arrow arrow: Jump from sides of the canyonObjective: Try to collect the coins and don't get pushed off the screen!Jumping Training ControlsPart 1 (Endurance)Left and right arrows: Move the duckUp arrow: JumpObjective: Jump to stay on the screen and don't get crushed!Part 2 (Balance)Left and right arrows: Balance the stickHold up arrow key: Jump higherObjective: Jump over the gaps, and don't fall over!Part 3 (Skill)Right and left arrow arrow: Turn in the airObjective: Do as many of the tricks as you can before time runs out!How to Play Duck Life 4Start with creating ducks for your team.Train them how to run.Collect coins in training and buy food for your ducks with your coins to increase their energy levels.As you're ready for the tournament race, arrange your team and win the race to unlock another world where you'll learn new abilities.There are 6 worlds. Each has 3 different pieces of training to elevate the ducks' abilities, such as accuracy, speed, endurance, risk-taking and many more.Teach them how to run, climb, jump and fly and win the ultimate race.What are the worlds in Duck Life 4?There are 6 different worlds in Duck Life 4. You can unlock them as you win the tournaments. The worlds are as follows.Grassland: Learn runningSwamp: Train swimming in the lakeMountains: Train flying and improve accuracy.Glacier: Train jumping and learn how to take risksCity: Train jumping with balance.Volcano: The boss world to apply all that you learned in previous worlds.DeveloperWix Games developed Duck Life 4.What is More?Duck Life 4 is part of an RPG game series. There are 4 Duck Life games available. If you haven't played the prequels play them all!Duck LifeDuck Life 2Duck Life 3This article was updated on October 16, 20241 Player2DAnimalArcadeAvoidCrazyCuteFlyingFreeRacingRPG
